Name: Anime - Match The Memory
About the game: Finding pairs might sound easy, but this game will definitely challenge your brain! Train your memory, concentration, accuracy, attention, the speed of thinking and logic skills and much more. This game is a great way to exercise your memory and keep your brain fit! ✔ Play by making matches of cards ✔ 6 game modes ✔ Simple and easy-to-master interface ✔ Colorful HD graphic ✔ Visual memory training ✔ Improve memory skills How to play? For each level, player is required to tap the square buttons and need to memorize what is behind it in order to match its couple. It is a single player game, but it can be played by two or more players. Players can compete with others or with their own record. It has time counting.
